Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

a little late for my greeting but.. still. Hello everyone. I don\'t know much about rocketry, or about very much else. But you\'ll find me actively killing spam on the wiki and trying my hand a not losing Jeb to the depths of inter-stellar space / burning him to death on the launch-pad!

Cheers,

PD

Edit: I\'m a proud fully paid up pre-order-er! Good work guys, I\'m loving it.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thanks guys.. yup the copy/paste reply ninja\'d you good and proper

PD
